sense.gloss: to content oneself with, to be resigned to (one's fate), to be contented (satisfied) with (one's lot)

sdata.j: ↑運命↑↓うんめい↓に↑甘↑↓|あま↓んじる|くらいなら↑自殺↑↓じさつ↓したほうがいい。
sdata.e: I would rather kill myself than reconcile myself to my fate.

sdata.j: ↑自分↑↓じぶん↓の↑運命↑↓うんめい↓に↑甘↑↓|あま↓んじる|くらいなら↑自殺↑↓じさつ↓した↑方↑↓ほう↓がましだ。
sdata.e: I might as well kill myself as reconcile myself to my fate.
